page.title: 01INDEX
page.content: {INDUSTRY AND TRANSPORT: } The area covered has very little industrial development apart from the industrial estates in the south west section. It is however well served by transport links with both the M1 and the new electrified railway. {HOUSING:}A wide variety of housing can be found within the area, ranging from the villages of Upper and Lower Sundon to the modern estates of Luton where a new estate is currently under construction. {RECREATION AND LEISURE:}The area has two sports centres,a large number of public playing fields and open spaces as well as a variety of social clubs and pubs. {FARMING AND LANDSCAPE:}At least a third of the area is used for farming with the major crops being cereals.
